channel.title: Development blog on Tech.Feminizidmap.org
channel.description: Recent content in Development blog on Tech.Feminizidmap.org

item.title: 2nd update, week 2 and 3
item.description: Times flies by! What did I do? On the tech side I was thinking about and started implementing models for application settings and pre-defined option lists for certain properties.

item.title: Week 1 in review
item.description: On March 1st the 9th round of the Prototype Fund has officially begun and we’re a part of it! After the initial kickoff workshop past Monday and the last bits of paperwork out of the way, the first week was all about setting up the initial infrastructure.

item.title: Project init
item.description: Hello, World! This is just a small entry to kick-start this blog on the development of mapper and other apps and software helping document and map femi(ni)cides in Germany.
